attributes.action: Debate new minimum £25,700 salary bringing foreign-born spouses to UK
attributes.additional_details:
The government's migration advisory committee has recommended that those wishing to bring a spouse or child to live in Britain on a family visa should have a minimum salary before tax of between £18,700 and £25,700,
66% of workers earn less than minimum required
This policy is unfair, unjust, and should be stopped; Human rights are being affected by this proposal, so please everyone. don't let this the UK government discriminate poor people, David Cameron PM you have kids and family?, what if someone told you "well we don't think you can live with your family because you don't earn enough", Immigration is vital for the economic growth, and ethnic diversity of the UK, please sign to stop this ethnic, financial cleansing.
